summary: The FA Cup is a national football competition between all clubs in England that are linked with the sport's governing body in that country, The Football Association.
full_text: The Association is an American pop band from California in the folk rock or soft rock genre. During the 1960s, they had numerous hits at or near the top of the Billboard charts  and were the lead-off band at 1967's Monterey Pop Festival.
title: The Association
